other_tests.findings: Colorblind in the right eye; normal color vision in the left eye.
Diffuse metamorphopsia (distortion of straight lines) in the right eye.
Intraocular pressure of 16 mm Hg in the right eye and 17 mm Hg in the left eye.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Intraocular pressures improved to 17 mm Hg in both eyes post-surgery.

other_tests.findings: Right eye showed a diffusely decreased visual field with an area of relative sparing superonasally; left eye normal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Visual fields improved post-surgery, showing substantially less reduction in sensitivity.

other_tests.findings: Presence of edematous polypoid fragments of tissue and infiltrate including eosinophils confirming allergic fungal sinusitis.
